title: Honour badge not displaying in load screen
body:
In some games my level 3 honour badge is only displaying in some games loading screens 

Is this a bug or some actual reason?

replies.body:
This may not be a bug, you only achieve a level 3 honour flair when you have been Honoured by 2 pre-made team mates or 1 random stranger in the previous game. So maybe you havent been honoured {{item:3073}} 

~ Totally not a morgana main
Interesting, so I MUST be honoured in the previous game in order for it to show up?

Yepp, you MUST be honoured by atleast 1 stranger or 2 premade friends that were ingame with you, one easy way to find out whether or not you have the flair is to look at the little tiny section under your champion border at the end game screen (where everyone talks smack if they lose) and if you get enough honour for a flair next game a little blue ribbon/border will appear on the blue box where it shows what honours you got ~ :)

BTW, to add onto what the Morg main has stated already. If you have the flair on a loading screen for one game, you still have to earn honours for the game you're playing for it to appear in your next game and so forth :)
